      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_86919</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_86919</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Coupe transversale de la Terre et sa composition</string>
            <string language="en">Earth cross-section and its composition</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse Querschnitts und sein Aufbau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Terra de seção transversal e sua composição</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Terra cross-section e la relativa composizione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γήινη διατομή και η σύνθεσή του</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tierra seccionada transversalmente y su 
composición</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme illustre une section transversale de la terre composée de croûte faite en roche solide, du manteau  externe fait de magma, du manteau intérieur fait en roche solide, le noyau externe en fusion et le noyau intérieur plein composés tous deux de nickel et de fer.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates a cross-section of the Earth composed of crust made of solid rock, outer mantle made of magma, inner mantle made of solid rock, molten outer core and solid inner core both made of nickel and iron.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">croûte</string>
            <string language="en">crust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la Terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">manteau intérieur</string>
            <string language="en">inner mantle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">fer</string>
            <string language="en">iron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">magma</string>
            <string language="en">magma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">métaux</string>
            <string language="en">Metals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">noyau externe en fusion</string>
            <string language="en">molten outer core</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">nickel</string>
            <string language="en">nickel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">manteau externe</string>
            <string language="en">outer mantle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">noyau intérieur plein</string>
            <string language="en">solid inner core</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">roche solide</string>
            <string language="en">solid rock</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht einen Querschnitt
der Masse, die aus der Kruste besteht, die vom Felsen, der äußere 
Umhang gebildet wird, der vom Magma, der innere Umhang gebildet wird, 
der vom Felsen gebildet wird, bildeten flüssiger äußerer Kern und 
fester innerer Kern vom Nickel und vom Eisen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra um cross-section da terra 
composta da crosta feita da rocha contínua, mantle exterior feito do 
magma, mantle interno feito da rocha contínua, o núcleo exterior 
derretido e o núcleo interno contínuo  fizeram niquelar e de ferro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra una sezione trasversale 
della terra composta di crosta fatta della roccia compatta, il manto 
esterno fatto di magma, manto interno fatto della roccia compatta, il 
nucleo esterno fuso ed il nucleo interno solido sia hanno fatto di 
nichel che di ferro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί μια διατομή της γης που 
αποτελείται από την κρούστα φιαγμένη από στερεό βράχο, 
εξωτερικό μανδύα φιαγμένους από μάγμα, εσωτερικό μανδύα 
φιαγμένο από στερεό βράχο, λειωμένο εξωτερικό πυρήνα και 
στερεό εσωτερικό πυρήνα και φιαγμένους από νικέλιο και σίδηρο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra una sección representativa
de la tierra integrada por la corteza hecha de la roca sólida, capa 
externa hecha del magma, capa interna hecha de roca sólida, la base 
externa fundida y la base interna sólida hicieron del níquel y del 
hierro.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
